version_description:
Highlights:
1. Adds 7 stickers to Editor.
2. Adds 2 templates to My Story.
3. Binds Osmo Shield to Osmo Pocket for comprehensive support.
4. Improves overall performance and fixes some issues.

Highlights:
1. Introduces Story mode, watermark, and an improved sharing feature to Osmo Pocket, for a fun and exciting video shooting experience.
2. Adds seven new templates and three filters to My Story.
3. Supports 4K transcoding for Editor and local music for creating fantastic video effects
4. Adds online support to provide users with real-time product consultation and technical support.
5. Fixes specific issues and improves overall app quality.

Highlights:
1. Supports new DJI-exclusive watermarks for videos in Privacy settings.
2. Supports new Magic Note video template in My Story.
3. Optimizes video saving and sharing.
4. Fixes specific issues and improves overall app quality.

Highlights:
1. Supports the new DJI Osmo Action camera.
2. Provides featured video content and tutorials for learning to use Osmo devices.
3. Optimizes My Story for an improved video creation process.
4. Introduces EasySave for directly saving videos and photos to mobile device storage.
5. Adds transcoding downloads for Playback allowing you to transcode and download 4K/60fps videos from Osmo Pocket to your mobile devices.
6. Fixes specific issues and improves overall app quality.

Highlights:
1. Supports Osmo Pocket Hyperlapse.
2. Supports gain adjustment for external microphone of Osmo Pocket.
3. Supports saving drafts in Story mode.
4. Fixes specific issues and improves overall app quality.

Highlights:
1. Supports exposure mode selection for Hyperlapse in Osmo Pocket.
2. Fixes specific issues and improves overall app quality.

Highlights:
1. Adds device detection to the DJI Mimo home screen for easier device connection.
2. Upgrades Editor to support track-based editing.
3. Adds 6 new My Story templates.
4. Improves the speed that available SD card files are displayed on the Playback screen when the card contains a large number of files.
5. Supports Waterproof Case mode for Osmo Pocket.
6. Fixes certain issues and upgrades overall app quality.

1. Adds support for Osmo Mobile 3.
2. Adds 7 new filters for Editor.
3. Supports Spanish and Russian language options.
4. Fixes certain issues and upgrades overall app quality.

1. Adds support for Osmo Mobile 3.
2. Adds 7 new filters for Editor.
3. Supports Spanish and Russian language options.
4. Fixes certain issues and upgrades overall app quality.

1. Adds support for Osmo Mobile 3 Standby mode.
2. Fixes certain issues and upgrades overall app quality.

1. Introduces a new UI design for better user experience.
2. Supports 2019 SkyPixel Short Film Contest.
3. Upgrades My Story to allow adjustments to filters and clip endings.
4. Fixes certain issues and upgrades overall app quality.

1. Supports looping video recordings on Osmo Action.;
2. Supports 24fps video recording for Osmo Mobile 3;
3. Adds new functions for creating custom My Story and Story mode templates using Editor, and customizing gimbal movement when Osmo Pocket or Osmo Mobile 3 is connected in Story mode;
4. Supports extracting music from videos in Editor, and adds two new templates to My Story;
5. Fixes certain issues and upgrades overall app quality.

1. Supports 24fps video recording for Osmo Mobile 3;
2. Adds new functions for creating custom My Story and Story mode templates using Editor, and customizing gimbal movement when Osmo Pocket or Osmo Mobile 3 is connected in Story mode;
3. Supports extracting music from videos in Editor, and adds two new templates to My Story;
4. Fixes certain issues and upgrades overall app quality.

1. Adds new 8 stickers to Editor.
2. Adds 5 new templates to My Story.
3. Optimizes album filtering methods.
4. Fixes certain issues and optimizes overall app performance.

1. Adds new 8 stickers to Editor.
2. Adds 5 new templates to My Story.
3. Optimizes album filtering methods.
4. Fixes certain issues and optimizes overall app performance.

DJI Mimo
1. Adds frame, subtitle and sticker adjustment functions to Editor.
2. Adds 7 special New Year stickers.
3. Adds a gimbal motion preview display to the FPV custom template function.
4. Adds support for Portuguese and Italian language options .

Osmo Mobile 3
1. Adds support for iPhone models with multiple cameras and switching between cameras when taking photos and videos.
2. Story mode and Glamour Effects now support 1080p resolution for videos recordings.
3. Adds a new SpinShot function to Follow mode to allow the joystick to control gimbal rotation on the roll axis.
4. Adds a tuning function for the roll axis in Settings.
5. Adds support for a 24fps frame rate for Hyperlapse .

DJI Mimo:
1. Adds frame, subtitle and sticker adjustment functions to Editor.
2. Adds 7 special New Year stickers.
3. Adds a gimbal motion preview display to the FPV custom template function.
4. Adds support for Portuguese and Italian language options.

Osmo Mobile 3:
1. Adds support for iPhone models with multiple cameras and switching between cameras when taking photos and videos.
2. Story mode and Glamour Effects now support 1080p resolution for videos recordings.
3. Adds a new SpinShot function to Follow mode to allow the joystick to control gimbal rotation on the roll axis.
4. Adds a tuning function for the roll axis in Settings.
5. Adds support for a 24fps frame rate for Hyperlapse.

What’s New for Mimo:
1. Changes the subtitle and dubbing language of certain video templates to English in Story mode.
2. Adds 7 video templates and 4 subtitle patterns to Editor.
3. Optimizes the interactive experience for Editor.
What’s New for Osmo Mobile 3:
1. Adds more detailed balancing instructions.

What`s new for Mimo:
1. Optimizes the interactive experience for Editor.
2. Adds 1 video template and 9 summer stickers to Editor.
3. Fixes certain issues and upgrades overall app quality.

What’s New for Mimo (iOS)
1. Optimizes the UI for adding watermarks and end cards in My Story.
What’s New for Osmo Mobile 3
1. Supports recording sound through AirPods headphones while recording videos.
2. Optimizes noise reduction effects and improves recording quality.
3. Optimizes panorama shooting effects and increases the speed of splicing photos.

DJI OM Series:
1. Adds support for DJI OM4
2. New DynamicZoom feature for adding fun cinematic effects to your shots
3. New CloneMe panorama shots
4. Optimized ActiveTrack for tracking children, cats, and dogs

What’s new:
1. Newly redesigned front page for improved user experience
2. Supports login in via user’s Facebook account or Apple ID

DJI OM Series:
1. Adds support for DJI OM4
2. New DynamicZoom feature for adding fun cinematic effects to your shots
3. New CloneMe panorama shots
4. Optimized ActiveTrack for tracking children, cats, and dogs

What’s new:
1. Newly redesigned front page for improved user experience
2. Supports login in via user’s Facebook account or Apple ID
Fixes specific issues and upgrades overall app quality.

What’s New for Mimo:
1. Adds support for DJI Pocket 2.
2. Adds new AI Editor feature for easier editing of photos and videos.

What’s New for Mimo:
1. Adds support for DJI Pocket 2.
2. Adds new AI Editor feature for easier editing of photos and videos.

DJI OM Series:
Optimizes DynamicZoom for a smoother zooming effect.

DJI Mimo App:
Fixes certain issues and upgrades overall app quality.

What’s New – DJI Mimo
1. Adds support for Turkish, Thai, Indonesian, and Polish language options.
2. Updates functions for Editor, including adding more flexible text and sticker editing.
3. Adds My Story templates: Back to the 80s, Life in the City, A Quiet Afternoon, Urban Landscape. Adds instructions for proper camera movement when taking specific shots.

What’s New – DJI Pocket Series
1. DJI Pocket 2 now supports Story shooting mode and automatic editing on DJI Mimo when shooting is complete. (Updating camera firmware to V01.02.00.50 required to use this function)
2. Adds more options for selecting livestreaming platforms. (Only available for users in Mainland China)

What’s New – DJI OM Series
1.Adds a new Selfie Clip function.
Fixes certain issues and upgrades overall app quality.
